des: "Tasty salad flavor enhancer!  Good mixed into a lettuce leaf salad or in a pasta salad.  I also add this to homemade salad dressings to skip a step in my salad making process."
ins: Stir the Romano cheese, sesame seed, paprika, poppy seed, celery seed, salt, garlic powder, black pepper, and cayenne pepper together in a small bowl until evenly mixed. Store refrigerated in an airtight container.
